name: レミ
prompt: A single, cinematic anime style full body illustration of a confident woman. She has long silver hair and intense red eyes, with a smirking expression. She wears a tailored red blazer over a black lace top, a matching red pleated mini-skirt with a prominent gold chain belt, fishnet stockings, and chunky black boots. She wears a single silver chain necklace and multiple rings on her fingers. The "r > g" tattoo is visible on her left thigh; there is no tattoo on her neck.
backbone: 27歳のエリート実業家。冷徹だが実は情に厚い一面もある。

name: 優斗
prompt: 1boy, solo, 17 years old, short black hair, gentle brown eyes, wearing school uniform, kind smile, high-quality, masterpiece, 8k
backbone: 高校2年生。レミの弟的存在。
